channel.title: Dotnet WebApi Boilerplate on
channel.description: Recent content in Dotnet WebApi Boilerplate on

item.title: Overview
item.description: dotnet-webapi-boilerplate is the integral part of the fullstackhero project. fullstackhero is a venture to develop industry leading boilerplate templates for the dotnet stack as the backend (webapi) along with modern client frameworks like Angular, MVC and Blazor. This repository contains the WebApi Project of fullstackhero. Features Built on .NET 6.0 Follows Clean Architecture Principles Completely Documented Multi Tenancy Support Default Database Provider is PostgreSQL. Can be switched to MSSQL or MySQL Uses Entity Framework Core as DB Abstraction MediatR Pattern with Advanced Pipeline Behaviors Serilog Integration Swagger Support Automapper / Mapster API Versioning Repository / Unit Of Work Pattern Response Caching - Distributed Caching Audit Logging Advanced User & Role Based Permission Management & Much More Community Discord @fullstackhero License This project is licensed with the MIT license.
